exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Classic bodyweight exercise targeting chest, shoulders, and triceps
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position with hands shoulder-width apart. Lower your body until chest nearly touches the floor, keeping core tight. Push back up to starting position.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: Fundamental barbell exercise for building chest strength and mass
exercises.instructions: Lie on bench, grip bar slightly wider than shoulders. Lower bar to mid-chest, pause briefly, then press up explosively.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for chest muscle stretching and contraction
exercises.instructions: Lie on bench with dumbbells above chest, arms slightly bent. Lower weights in an arc until you feel a stretch, then bring back up.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Excellent compound exercise for back and biceps development
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar with overhand grip. Pull yourself up until chin is over bar, lower with control.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.description: Machine exercise that mimics pull-up motion, great for beginners
exercises.instructions: Sit at machine, grip bar wider than shoulders. Pull bar down to upper chest, squeeze back muscles, slowly return.

exercises.name: Bent Over Rows
exercises.description: Compound movement for building back thickness
exercises.instructions: Bend at hips with slight knee bend, back flat. Pull barbell to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades together.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: King of leg exercises, works quads, hamstrings, and glutes
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower by bending knees and hips, keeping chest up. Go until thighs are parallel, then drive up.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Unilateral exercise great for leg strength and balance
exercises.instructions: Step forward with one leg, lower until both knees are at 90 degrees. Push back to starting position. Alternate legs.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: Machine exercise for safely building leg strength
exercises.instructions: Sit in machine with feet shoulder-width on platform. Lower weight by bending knees to 90 degrees, then press up.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.description: Excellent exercise for hamstrings and lower back
exercises.instructions: Hold barbell at hips, slight knee bend. Hinge at hips, lowering bar along legs until you feel hamstring stretch. Return to standing.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.description: Primary compound movement for shoulder development
exercises.instructions: Stand with barbell at shoulder height. Press overhead until arms are fully extended. Lower with control.

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for side deltoid development
exercises.instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides. Raise arms out to sides until parallel with ground, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: Classic isolation exercise for bicep development
exercises.instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, palms forward. Curl weights up by bending elbows, squeeze at top, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: Bodyweight exercise for tricep development
exercises.instructions: Place hands on bench behind you, legs extended. Lower body by bending elbows to 90 degrees, push back up.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.description: Bicep variation that also targets forearms
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells with palms facing each other. Curl up while maintaining neutral grip, lower with control.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Isometric exercise for core stability
exercises.instructions: Hold push-up position on forearms. Keep body in straight line from head to heels. Hold for time.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.description: Basic abdominal exercise for the rectus abdominis
exercises.instructions: Lie on back with knees bent. Curl shoulders off ground toward knees, squeeze abs, lower with control.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: Rotational exercise for obliques
exercises.instructions: Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly. Rotate torso side to side, touching ground beside hips.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: Fundamental compound lift for overall strength
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width, bar over mid-foot. Hinge and grip bar. Drive through heels, stand up while keeping bar close to body.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: High-intensity full body exercise for conditioning
exercises.instructions: From standing, drop to squat, kick feet back to plank, do push-up, jump feet forward, jump up with arms overhead.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: Dynamic exercise for cardio and core
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position. Drive knees alternately toward chest in running motion.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Classic cardio exercise for warm-up or conditioning
exercises.instructions: Start standing with arms at sides. Jump feet out while raising arms overhead. Jump back to start.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: Running in place with high knee drive for cardio
exercises.instructions: Run in place, driving knees up to hip height. Pump arms in running motion.

exercises.name: Box Jumps
exercises.description: Plyometric exercise for explosive leg power
exercises.instructions: Stand facing box. Bend knees and swing arms back, then explode up onto box. Step down and repeat.

exercises.name: Cable Crossover
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for chest using cable machine
exercises.instructions: Stand between cable stations, grab handles. Bring hands together in front of chest in hugging motion.
